description: Gan, also known as gan-chan, is the much-abused temple rat from the Adventures of Mini-Goddess series. Generally nice and friendly, Gan is somewhat emotional and very excitable, but highly prone to gluttony. Due to his nice and trusting nature, he`s often led off on some wild adventure by Skuld and Urd, with the end result of Gan getting physically abused in some way.
name: Gan
